name: Deep coma!
description:
You have fallen into a deep brain coma. Your illness keeps growing inside you, slowly taking over your body. The player represents your conscience trying to escape the coma to see her again... Amy please, wait for me!

F5 to restart game. If you Alt+Enter to go FullScreen you will lose some surfaces in the process, go fullscreen & press F5 to fix it.

KEYS:
Arrows  to  MOVE
Z  to  JUMP
X  to  DASH

"White Diamond PowerUP" Gives you an EXTRA jump + EXTRA dash.

The game is not finish at all, is just a short proyect for the GM48 with the base mechanics.

In a future update I'll add 100+ rooms with diferent obstacles & new interactions with the enviorement.

It was fun to code it all, but 48hs is a very limited time to finish with all the ideas in my mind hahaha ;)
